generatePadding

public static java.lang.String generatePadding(int size)
Generates a specified amount of padding spaces.

Parameters:
size - The number of padding characters to be generated.
Returns:
A String containing the specified number of padding characters.

padRight

public static java.lang.String padRight(java.lang.String unpaddedString,
                                        int size)
                                 throws AppRuntimeException
Adds padding to the right hand side of a string to bring it up to the required size.

Parameters:
unpaddedString - The string to be padded.
size - The required size of the string.
Returns:
The String with padding added to the left side.
Throws:
AppRuntimeException - RUN_ID_STRING_TOO_LARGE_FOR_MESSAGE - if the String was already larger than the requested size.
